page.title: 09Wetwang,Facilities
page.content: There is a{post office}in Wetwang in Northfield Road where you go for your stamps,pension and your family allowance.You can also buy stationery sets and cards there.It is open every day except Thursday afternoon and Sunday.There are two post boxes in the village,one at the post office and one in Back Lane. There are two{pubs}where you can go if you want a drink and a bit to eat.The pubs are open from 11am. to 2.30pm and from 5.30pm to 11pm.Both the pubs are in Main Street and they are "The Black Swan" and "The Victoria". The{garage}is in Main Street and it sells three star and four star petrol.They sell second-hand cars and do services,repairs and M,O,t.tests.
